comments.body: This isn't visible to end users, so don't know if this matters. It's already documented in the usage. I am not sure this meaningfully helps.

comments.body: This is actually the first example on the spark doc and I wanted to know how the `pi` calculation was done. There was no mention of what algorithm is used for it, so took me a while to figure out the Monte-Carlo estimator was used and the logic is randomly generating over 100000 points to finally estimate the Pi value.
